attributes.action: Change excise duty on alcohol limit content on non spirits and wine to 5% abv
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: White Cider is currently taxed much less than other drinks, making it more accessible. Less than a pound per litre retail for 8.4% abv. Please consider severely raising excise duty on this to help stem the adverse affect on society.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
